settings.title: Quality Design
settings.body: Created in partnership with our friends at Sjöstrand in Stockholm.

settings.title: Two Year Guarantee
settings.body: We want this to be your forever french press.

settings.title: Need Coffee?
settings.body: Get a tin of ours! We roast it every day in our London roastery.

settings.title: Stainless steel double-wall french press
settings.body: In partnership with our friends at Sjöstrand in Stockholm, we've created a polished stainless steel french press with a stainless steel filter plunger.

settings.alt: Stainless steel french press with stainless steel plunger.
